name: Material Request Greater Than 3 Days Pending
query: select mr.* from `tabMaterial Request` mr inner join `tabMaterial Request Item` mri on mri.parent=mr.name where mr.status not in ('Stopped','Cancelled') and mr.transaction_date < NOW() - INTERVAL 3 DAY group by mr.name order by mr.transaction_date
report_name: Material Request Greater Than 3 Days Pending
